channel.title: surprise on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in surprise on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Great surprise party
item.description: (written 14:26 Tuesday 17 September 2019 JST) Honored to be invited to the event! AdmiredÂ that Rin has connected lots of people who could easily become friends. Upon arrival, Rin cried as Hiro predicted. Everyone had a great time. I friended Chris just because he commented on the FB group. Talked to him about PB 49 and 52, assuring him I could talk about it all night (even though 13 years at wow)

item.title: roadtrip to Denton to surprise my brother
item.description: Wednesday 5 March 1997 (transcribed out of my diary) Sunday night Wende and I drove to Denton to harass Fred in class Monday. We played 2 versions of the Alphabet Game (*) and had wonderful conversation on the way up there. I don’t remember what we talked about, but it was great. Once we got there, I essentially fell asleep immediately after we got back from shopping for milk, OJ & pizza.
